content: Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast is a secret Yaoguai King boss hidden in Chapter 5 of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. You can find this ferocious beast at the end of the hidden area, with its two types of elemental attacks making it a difficult fight.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Bishui_Golden-Eyed_Beast.md", under the primary heading "Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast". The content is presented below:

Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast is a secret Yaoguai King boss hidden in Chapter 5 of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. You can find this ferocious beast at the end of the hidden area, with its two types of elemental attacks making it a difficult fight.
